name: places/ChIJ12c6WeDywokR4m88dGjsbdQ
adrFormatAddress: 4305 Katonah Ave, Bronx, NY 10470-2015, USA

originalText.text: I am so grateful for this place. I gave 6 huge bags of laundry to them on Monday and picked them up on Tuesday. The clothes were folded beautifully and smelled great! The ladies are wonderful and kind..we are so happy to have found this place. Oh and the price is unbeatable!!! We’ll definitely be using them again.

text.text: I am so grateful for this place. I gave 6 huge bags of laundry to them on Monday and picked them up on Tuesday. The clothes were folded beautifully and smelled great! The ladies are wonderful and kind..we are so happy to have found this place. Oh and the price is unbeatable!!! We’ll definitely be using them again.

originalText.text:
Totally blown away by the level of genuine, personable service we receive here. It goes way beyond getting your laundry done at this point. I would buy anything these guys are selling. I don’t think I’ve ever been so happy to give anyone money.

Aside from all this, laundry is done perfectly with attention to detail and in record breaking time.

The fact that Dermott is the nicest guy ever is just icing on the cake.

originalText.text: Dad and son run this laundromat. Irish, small family place with impeccable service. They pick up, wash and fold, drop off for reasonable price. Always friendly, remember our names, say hello when we walk by. If you want a real neighborhood place that is clean, friendly and professional come here. They pay their staff and also All tips go to the ladies that wash and fold. The cost includes the friendly and small town like service and the $$$ you spend is put back into the local community. If you want Woodlawn to stay like a small town - go here and avoid anywhere that is a chain or owned by folks who are not invested in the social kindness and economy of the neighborhood.

originalText.text:
If there were 10 stars I would give them 10. Love this place. Whether im going to do my laundry their myself (super clean, ALL BRAND NEW WASHERS & DRYERS, new big screens), OR using their pick-up/drop-off service. They are the best hands down.

Owner & staff also super friendly. And if i schedule a pick up, they drop everything off folded n washed the very same day.

originalText.text: I’ve lived in every borough of NYC and this is by far the best wash & fold drop off business in this city. Owner and staff are extremely friendly, timely, and fair with prices.
